verses.name: Psalms 119:1
verses.text: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 119:2
verses.text: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.

verses.name: Psalms 119:3
verses.text: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.

verses.name: Psalms 119:4
verses.text: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.

verses.name: Psalms 119:5
verses.text: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!

verses.name: Psalms 119:6
verses.text: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:7
verses.text: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:8
verses.text: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.
